questions.question: You are a student with a B2 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 100 words. Do you think it is more important to have an enjoyable job or to make money? Explain your point of view.

answers.answer: In my perspective, it is essential to strike a balance between having an enjoyable job and making money. While earning a good income is essential for a comfortable living, it is equally important to find a job that one enjoys and finds fulfilling. A job that aligns with one's interests and values can provide a sense of purpose and motivation, leading to increased productivity and job satisfaction. On the other hand, a job that is monotonous or unfulfilling, no matter how well-paying, can lead to burnout and dissatisfaction. Thus, I believe it is essential to find a job that offers both financial stability and personal enjoyment.
